placeholder.no_solved: Ouch! This team has not uncovered the topic……

team.label: Select team to compete
team.description: Please select a team to participate in a match that cannot be changed after selection

join.title: Completion Registration Information
content: Are you sure you want to register for this game?

Once you sign up for and approve the match, the team will be locked and will no longer be able to make changes to people,invites and kicks the team. The team will be unlocked after the match ends or when the request is denied.
The number of players requires that the number of members of the team be selected, andwhether or not the team participates in the match in that capacity.

invite_code.label: Please enter the invitation code
invite_code.description: This match opens the invitation match. Enrollment needs to provide an invitation code.

organization.label: Select Organization
organization.description: This match has more than one participant. Please select your organization

writeup.title: Writeup manage

instructions.title: Submission instructions
instructions.deadline: Please submit the writeup before <1>{{datetime}}</1>, late submission or non-submission will be considered a waiver of game score.
instructions.file_format: 请将全部解出题目整理为<1>一份小于 20MB 的标准 PDF 文档</1>。

writeup.unsubmitted_note: 你的队伍尚未提交 Writeup

content: Are you sure you want to exit this match?
The team participation information will be deleted after exiting if the number of people is empty.

no_cheat.title: No team cheats yet
no_cheat.comment: It seems to be true for all

team_view.label: Team View
team_view.description: Use team view to display cheats

all_solved.title: All topics were untouched!
all_solved.comment: Perhaps more difficult challenges are waiting for you in……

no_traffic.title: No data captures enabled
no_traffic.comment: Requires both platform configuration and title to be enabled

content.no_challenge: Ouch! No topics available for this match with……
content.scoreboard_tip: Tip: Scroll the list of topics by left and right arrow!
content.game_lasts_long: Match will also be an employee
content.scoreboard_note: Note: teams with same score are ranked by submission time.

notification.no_team: Please select the team to join
notification.select_chal_and_part: Please select topics and teams first

pending.title: You have successfully registered as a member of team {{team}}

rejected.title: Your entry request was not approved
rejected.content: Please make sure you are eligible to re-register after you meet your requirements

suspended.title: Your team {{team} } has been suspended
suspended.content: If you hear any objection, please contact the administrator to make an appeal

not_started.title: Game not yet started
not_started.mobile: Please use computer to play and see the details of the match.
not_started.content: You have successfully registered and passed the review as a member of team {{team}}. Please wait for the game start.

team_required.title: Unable to register at this time
team_required.content: You didn't join any team, please create and join a team on the <1> Team Management </1> page.
